recipes.title: Panera's Broccoli Cheddar Soup
recipes.author: Christy Denney
recipes.description: Met the 1/4 cup butter and sautee the onions on the stove-top until soft. Sprinkle the flour over the mixture. Cook and stir over medium heat for 1-2 minutes.

recipes.title: Panera's Broccoli Cheddar Soup - The Girl Who Ate Everything
recipes.description: Melt the 1/4 cup butter and sautee the 1/2 medium chopped onion in the butter until soft. Sprinkle the 1/4 cup flour over the mixture. Cook and stir over medium heat for 1-2 minute
